#include <iostream>
    using namespace std;
    class Block
    {
        int data;
    
    public:
        Block(int i = 10)
            : data(i)
        { 
            cout << """"I just created a Block """" << endl;
        }
        ~Block()
        {
            cout << """"I will destroy a Block with """" << data << endl;
        }
        void inc()
        {
            data++;
        }
    };
    class A
    {
        Block& block1;
        Block block2;
    
    public:
        A(Block& blk)
            : block1(blk)
            , block2(blk)
        {
            cout << """"I just created an A """" << endl;
        }
        A(const A& a)
            : block1(a.block1)
            , block2(a.block2)
        {
            cout << """"I just created an A by copying but I will also do bad things"""" << endl;
            block1.inc();
            block2.inc();
        }
        ~A()
        {
            cout << """"I will destroy an A """" << endl;
        }
        void inc()
        {
            block1.inc();
            block2.inc();
        }
    };
    class Fat
    {
        A a;
        A& ra;
        A* pa;
    
    public:
        Fat(A& da)
            : a(da)
            , ra(da)
        {
            pa = new A(da);
            cout << """"Fat just created !"""" << endl;
        }
        ~Fat()
        {
            delete pa;
            cout << """"Fat to be destroyed !"""" << endl;
        }
        void inc()
        {
            a.inc();
            ra.inc();
            pa->inc();
        }
    };
    int main()
    {
        Block block;
        A a(block);
        Fat fat(a);
        fat.inc();
        return 0;
    }
